page.title: 08Two Swindon Schools.
page.content: {Westlea Primary School}opened in 1983. There are 10 classrooms, 3 library areas ans a hall which is used for assemblies,P.E.,and dinners. Our uniform is brown and white and there are 230 pupils. The classes are mixed in age and ability and We do a lot of topic work, Maths, English, gardening and carpentry. We have a computer, a colour TV., piano, copier and musical instruments. {Birch street School} opened in 1887. There are 90 stairs and 14 small classrooms. Many are not used.All the rooms have cracks in the ceilings and walls. We have a Youth club which is 10p to get in.I like my School because I have nice friends. Many Swindon Schools have been closed because of the falling birth-rate.
